item.description:
Let's explore the streets between Beacon and Boylston to see all the fancy houses. We'll take a look at the Brookline Reservoir as well.

The Dunks is close to the Cleveland Circle stop on the Green C line, and the Reservoir stop on the Green D Line. We'll return to this spot at the end of the walk.

I'll keep the walk to about 4 miles, and post a detailed one when I make it.

Here's the map I made.

Dinner afterwards for those who are interested.

Doug
item.how_to_find_us: I'll email my cell # to the RSVPs
item.name: Exploring Brookline
